reuters.title: CANADA LIFTS CORPORATE TAX REVENUES BY FIVE BILLION DLRS OVER FIVE YEARS - OFFICIAL
reuters.body: Shr four cts vs four cts Net 1,180,000 vs 902,000 Revs 146.9 mln vs 37.0 mln Avg shrs 33 mln vs 23.9 mln NOTE: Company changed its fiscal year from December 31 to the last day of February, thus results of operations for the year-ago period have been restated to reflect this change. Current first quarter includes results of operations of Loews Theatre Management Corp which Tri-Star acquired December 31. Reuter 
